Package org.knime.core.ui.node.workflow

Interface WorkflowCopyWithOffsetUI

All Superinterfaces:
UI, WorkflowCopyUI
public interface WorkflowCopyWithOffsetUI extends WorkflowCopyUI, UI
Represents copied parts of a workflow including their offset.
Author:
Martin Horn, KNIME GmbH, Konstanz, Germany

    • calcOffset

      static int[] calcOffset(org.knime.core.node.workflow.WorkflowCopyContent wcc, WorkflowManagerUI wfm)
      Calculates the offset (i.e. minimal x,y-position) of a WorkflowCopyContent-object. The actual objects (nodes, annotations) to get the positions are provided by the given workflow manager.
      Parameters:
      wcc - the copy object representing the objects to get the offset for
      wfm - workflow manager to get the actual object positions
      Returns:
      2-dim array containing the offset (x,y)
